eventDecorators.name: Claimed
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another, either via `#transfer` or `#transferFrom`. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: proxy
parameterDecorators.description: The variable debt token proxy address.
